ProteinName	Beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase 7 (Beta-1,4-GalTase 7) (Beta4Gal-T7) (b4Gal-T7) (EC 2.4.1.-) (Proteoglycan UDP-galactose:beta-xylose beta1,4-galactosyltransferase I) (UDP-Gal:beta-GlcNAc beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase 7) (UDP-galactose:beta-N-acetylglucosamine beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase 7) (UDP-galactose:beta-xylose beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase) (XGPT) (XGalT-1) (Xylosylprotein 4-beta-galactosyltransferase) (EC 2.4.1.133) (Xylosylprotein beta-1,4-galactosyltransferase)
GeneName	B4GALT7 XGALT1 UNQ748/PRO1478
Length	327
Function	Required for the biosynthesis of the tetrasaccharide linkage region of proteoglycans, especially for small proteoglycans in skin fibroblasts.
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus; Golgi stack membrane
